name: Kitopay
subtitle: Dine in Payment App
text: A web app that allows customers to view the restaurant menu and pay for their food by scanning a QR code on the table. The app is integrated with the POS system and supports Google Pay, Apple Pay, and card payment options.

name: RightBite
subtitle: Meal Plans Responsive Web App
text: A web app serving as a storefront for a meal plan business. Customers can order meal plans, schedule consultations with dietitians, edit delivery days, and swap meals. Additionally, I co-developed the Right Bite Admin App, enabling staff to manage customer settings, adjust meal plans, book consultations, and change delivery addresses.

name: SKOSWeb
subtitle: Food Ordering App
text: A web app similar to food aggregator platforms like Pyszne, Deliveroo, and Tabat. It enables customers to select meals from various brands and pay a single delivery fee. The app supports multiple tenants, allowing each to sell its products or products from associated brands. I also played a key role in the development of a SKOSWeb CMS app, where staff can create and configure tenants, modify banners, brands, menus, playlists, tags, categories, cashback values, and more.

name: Kitopi Rewards
subtitle: Landing Page
text: A landing page displayed to customers who wanted to claim their cashback but did not have the Kitopi rewards mobile app.

name: Brand LP
subtitle: Landing Page
text: A landing page designed to redirect customers of a brand transitioning from a web platform to a mobile app. It essentially serves as an advertisement for the app.

name: Burger Heaven
subtitle: Burger Joint Landing Page
text: A place to check out the menu, book a table
